definition: an employee who performs clerical work, such as keeps records or accounts, to work as a clerk, as in the legal business
details:
noun
- an employee who performs clerical work, such as keeps records or accounts
= example: an employee who performs clerical work, such as keeps records or accounts
- a salesperson in a store
= synonyms: salesclerk, shop clerk
verb
- to work as a clerk, as in the legal business
= example: to work as a clerk, as in the legal business
